biography: Olli, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his meticulous approach to the game and unwavering dedication to emulating his idol, Bryson Dechambeau. Representing Hirsala Golf, Olli brings a blend of technical skill and quiet intensity to the course.

With eight past appearances, Olli's experience is a valuable asset. His lone victory in the Hector Trophée stands as a testament to his ability to perform under pressure, and his Victor Trophy win further underscores his individual prowess. He will make his ninth appearance in 2025.

Off the course, Olli is known for his analytical mind, often seen poring over course statistics and meticulously planning his strategy. While some might find him reserved, his passion for golf is undeniable, and his commitment to continuous improvement makes him a formidable competitor.
